channel.title: Help with pickup command

item.title: Help with pickup command
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

		if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
			try {
               int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
               int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
               if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) {
                  addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
               } else {
                  sendMessage("No such item.");
               }
            } catch(Exception e) {
               sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup ITEMID ITEM AMOUNT");
            }
		} 
			
	}//remove
}//these lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pickup command
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

this is what mine looks like so but your has else if (command.startswith
mine has just if (command.startswith

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
